title: Belgian Waffles
methods: Mix all the dry ingredients together in a large bowl. Gradually beat in the egg, then add the milk slowly, whisking well to get as smooth a batter as possible.
Grate in the orange zest and add a few drops of vanilla extract.
Get your waffle machine ready. Once it's hot, ladle in the batter mixture and seal, cook for 8 - 10 minutes.
